attr.title: Leap Year
attr.desc: Leap Year is a clumsy platformer about knowledge and discovery. Explore a compact, hand drawn world filled with hidden paths. Understand the gameâ€™s secrets to reach new areas and collect all the pages of your calendar.
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game from: Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2951770/Leap_Year/ or Itch https://managore.itch.io/leap-year Locate your gamefolder and copy all the files from the folder to leapyear/assets/
attr.inst_md: Purchase and download the game from: [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2951770/Leap_Year/) or [Itch](https://managore.itch.io/leap-year) Locate your gamefolder and copy all the files from the folder to leapyear/assets/
